text.section: No provision of KRS 434.870 to 434.876 shall be construed to prevent any action by a law enforcement agency, or any officer, employee, or agent of such agency, or any action of an agent of the financial information repository when working in conjunction with a law enforcement agency.

KRS 434.870 to 434.876 does not apply to:
Efforts by the financial information repository to test security procedures or systems of the financial institution repository for maintaining the confidentiality of customer information;
Investigations of alleged financial institution repository employee misconduct or negligence; or
Efforts to recover financial or personal information of the financial institution obtained or received by another person in any manner described in KRS 434.872.

law.history: Created 2002 Ky. Acts ch. 175, sec. 7, effective July 15, 2002.
